code: import React from'react';import{FaPlus}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddItem=_ref=>{let{newItem,setNewItem,handleSubmit}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"addForm",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"add",children:"Add Item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{autoFocus:true,id:"addItem",type:"text",placeholder:"Add Item",required:true,value:newItem,onChange:e=>setNewItem(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit","aria-label":"Add Item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaPlus,{})})]});};export default AddItem;
